snippet: The orchestra announced on Monday that Mr. Morales, who was to have started in the position next September, has decided to stay in Philadelphia "for family reasons."
abstract: The orchestra announced on Monday that Mr. Morales, who was to have started in the position next September, has decided to stay in Philadelphia "for family reasons."

headline.main: Ricardo Morales, Star Clarinetist, Reverses His Decision to Join the New York Philharmonic
headline.print_headline: New York Philharmonic Doesn’t Get Its Man
